game_description: Gather your friends! Solve puzzles! Dodge traps! Die! A lot! This world is Hazard Us! In this quirky, hilarious romp you and your fellow explorers will meet in your home base before heading off through a mystical portal to explore an ancient tomb full of hidden dangers. Work together to solve physics based puzzles. Leap out of the way of dangers. Sip tea and brush up on your British accents! Hazard Us is a cooperative Escape Game with chaotic and silly dangers around every corner. It will challenge players to use their wits, reactions and teamwork to survive. Can you grab the Cursed Idol without losing your lives in the process?!? Join our discord! https://discord.gg/7c3z6VRE
review_1: So me and my friend we completed the whole puzzle we were wondering how to get to the next level and it was just not fun anymore so please add more levels and when is the full version coming out and is it going to be free?
review_2: The game is great, very nice and challenging missions, cool animations, funny ghost idea in general, it looks like everything is great BUT the movement is just horrible, I understand that beginners didn't like the joystick movement, and some people they prefer to teleport, but the movement solution is so bad, it is impossible to avoid motion sickness, just add a regular joystick movement with the possibility of teleportation and the game will be perfect.
review_3: My husband and I tried the demo for a little while and we love the concept! Just a few minor suggestions.. The first is that I became pretty motion sick really fast.. Especially because you get pushed away when getting close to tables and objects. A solution could be those vignettes that are sometimes used, or a helmet or something that blocks your view partially. The second one is not being able to turn using the thumbstick. It could help prevent hitting furniture in our case xD
review_4: Its brilliant with a friend, so much fun and also many custom features when it comes to customize you funny charcter. Hope the the devs will keep the good work and bring ad fast as they can also other levels.
review_5: This game has an amazing concept, entertaining gameplay and fun to use multi-player. I do have 2 things I'd like to say 1. I know it is still in demo, but it would be nice to have more cosmetics 2. It would be nice to have some sort of name tag system to know who is who. Can't wait for more updates!
